name: Adventures of Arachnoman
description:
The famous superhero Arachnoman (no relation) has been trapped at the bottom of a mine shaft by his nemesis. How high can you get out the mine while collecting coins along the way?

The aim of the game is to collect as many coins as possible while avoiding the evil red spikes and lava.

Controls:

  • Click to the left of the player to control the left web
  • Click to the right of the player to control the right web
  • Click multiple times to cycle through each web's actions:
    • Shoot web
    • Reel in web
    • Disconnect web

Credits

Programming - Gallahron

Art - Lizzlane

Font used is Commando by DefaultError

Made in 72 hours for Scorespace #9
